metadata.message: The JSON version of this file is programatically generated from Bicep. PLEASE DO NOT UPDATE MANUALLY!!
metadata.description: Provide a prefix (unique at tenant-scope) for the Management Group hierarchy and other resources created as part of an Azure landing zone. DEFAULT VALUE = "alz"
Optionally set the deployment location for policies with Deploy If Not Exists effect. DEFAULT VALUE = "deployment().location"

Optionally set the scope for custom Policy Definitions used in Policy Set Definitions (Initiatives). Must be one of '/', '/subscriptions/id' or '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/id'. DEFAULT VALUE = '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/${topLevelManagementGroupPrefix}'

properties.displayName: Deploy Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts (AMBA-ALZ) for Web
properties.description: This initiative deploys Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts (AMBA-ALZ) to monitor Web Services such as App Services.

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitoring Resource Group Name
metadata.description: Name of the resource group to deploy the ALZ monitoring resources to

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitoring Resource Group Tags
metadata.description: Tags to apply to the resource group

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitoring Resource Group Location
ALZ Monitoring disabled tag name
metadata.description: Tag name used to disable monitoring at the resource level. Set to true if monitoring should be disabled.

metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitoring disabled tag values(s)
metadata.description: Tag value(s) used to disable monitoring at the resource level. Set to true if monitoring should be disabled.
The name of the user assigned managed identity to be created for monitoring purpose.
metadata.displayName: Name of the user assigned managed identity to be created.

metadata.description: The subscription ID of the management subscription where the user assigned managed identity will be created.
The resource Id of the user assigned managed identity provided by the customer.
metadata.displayName: Customer defined User Assigned managed Identity resource Id.
